Load key packages.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

Set seed for reproducibility.

```{r}
set.seed(12345)
```

Here's an old function.

```{r}
sim_mean_sd = function(n_obs, mu = 5, sigma = 1) {
  
  x_vec = rnorm(n = n_obs, mean = mu, sd = sigma)

  tibble(
    mean = mean(x_vec),
    sd = sd(x_vec)
  )
  
}
```
